official_title: Visiting Assistant Professor of Practice in Economics
bio:
Joon Nak Choi is Visiting Professor of Practice in Economics at NYU Shanghai. Professor Choi is also an Adjunct Assistant Professor of Management at Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. Prior to HKUST, Professor Choi was the WIlliam Perry Postdoctoral Fellow at the Shorenstein Asia-Pacific Research Center at Stanford University, where he researched the social capital linking Korean corporations to key overseas markets. 

Research Interests

  • Social Network Analysis
  • Organizational Theory
  • Corporate Strategy
  • Globalization & Global Cities
  • Industry Clusters
     

Education

  • PhD, Stanford University
